title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E. Balasubramanian

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E. Balasubramanian, High Commissioner of India to Nigeria today, 22nd February, 2024.
Discussions centred on issues arising from the 6th Nigeria-India Joint Commission held in Abuja in January, 2024, including specialized training for Officers in the Foreign Service. Other issues discussed included upcoming Senior Officials events on Political Consultations, Trade & Economic Relations, Security & Defence, among other bilateral and multilateral issues of mutual interest.
